s.hi: DS : I ’d like to give you some political situations and ask how a Satanist would handle them .

p.s: Okay , but I want to preface that and say we do n't really determine people ’s political backgrounds .

We feel that each Satanist who is a member of the church must make those decisions based upon their own personal values , so there can be a wide range of answers depending upon the people you talk to , whether it be abortion , governmental decisions of going to war …

hi.s: DS : You can just speak for yourself , then .

s.hi:
DS : — How would you handle the
Israeli-Palestinian issue
?

p.s: I do n't have a solution for that .
If I did , I would be out there telling people about it , because I do n't really see myself as a politician or arbiter of people ’s interactions with each other .

I can see that there are issues on both sides of the fence and that when people are fighting over a territory , generally speaking the folks who have the power win and then they write the histories and the world moves on .
But we have a situation here where there are bigger players behind the smaller nations , and it keeps this conflict enduring .
So they will either have to have compromise and discussion , or one side will have to destroy the other side and " win " and then move on , which is usually the way the world works .
